entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h then light late this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
